channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Ways to Turn Your Front-Line Employees Into Innovation Scouts
item.description: Your most powerful source of innovation is not your executive team—it’s the people on your front line.

item.title: Gen-Z Seeks Career Advice From AI. Here’s How Your Company Should Handle It
item.description: Young job seekers are seeking workplace advice from AI tools before they even leave college.

item.title: Coast Guard revises policy on ‘a noose, a swastika, and any symbols or flags co-opted or adopted by hate-based groups’
item.description: Hours after the revelation that it would describe them as "potentially divisive," the Coast Guard made clear, these are "prohibited."

item.title: 4 Brilliant Leadership Lessons You Can Learn From Donald Trump’s Meeting With Zohran Mamdani
item.description: The president welcomed the mayor elect to the Oval Office this past week.

item.title: Trump enlists Jack Nicklaus to help revamp the ‘president’s golf course’ — raising questions about who will pay the golf legend and how much
item.description: Nicklaus “will be the architect" and "design it,” Trump told reporters.

item.title: Solidcore Just Announced the Prizes It’s Giving Members Who Complete 10 Classes In 15 Days.
item.description: The Solidays challenge, which runs from December 4 to December 18, is a testament to Solidcore’s cult-like following.

item.title: Republican and Democratic senators alike oppose Trump’s Ukraine peace plan that acquiesces to many Russian demands
item.description: The plan was crafted by the Trump administration and the Kremlin without Ukraine’s involvement.
